Title: Now More Than Ever, We Care About You
Writer: Philip K. Dick (based on the book by), Frank Spotnitz (developed by), Wesley Strick
Actors: Alexa Davalos, Luke Kleintank, Joel de la Fuente, DJ Qualls
Plot: Juliana Crain makes a new acquaintance in the Neutral Zone - an Irish fixer named Wyatt - and soon finds herself on the run and seeking Tagomi's aid. The Japanese test an atomic bomb. Joe ...
